content:
Introducing Status Messages! 

Now I can share quick updates, announcements, and thoughts directly with you. These messages appear at the top of your feeds and disappear after 24 hours тАУ keeping everything fresh and current.

Watch for the green 'DAILY' badge for in-app updates and the gray 'LIVE' badge for API messages. It's my new way to stay connected with you in real-time. No more waiting for full posts when I have something quick to share!
title: New Feature Alert: Live Status Messages
